input.sentences: the city is getting a makeover with new buildings being built .
some of the buildings have a little park next to them .
most of the buildings are for multiple families to live in .
there are also high rise apartments being built .
some of the properties are fenced .
output.sentences: My family is looking for a new neighborhood to settle in.
Maybe living by a bridge is not so ideal.
Although I like the color grey, I'm not so sure my wife does.
She wouldn't appreciate not having a lush green backyard.
This grass may not be the best but at least there is a fence.
